name: Deception Engine
storyline:
11 cities and engines, the end of the world, betrayal, infiltration, and... a heist.

The criminal organization "Engine Raiders" aims to steal the "engines", the heart of each city, to revive the "City of Domination". The city named Utopia is the one that will be facing them.
The protagonist, a spy of Utopia, is disguised as a chief member of the Engine Raiders.
Their story now begins.
summary: Upcoming heist-themed roguelike deckbuilder by the developers of Chrono Ark. It is said that it will feature a similar combat system, full combat visuals and permanent dungeon progression.
